greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction expansion of the limit of a nested radical, sqrt(1 + sqrt(2 + sqrt(3 + sqrt(4 + ... )))).
comment: Increasing partial continued fractions of the above are 1, 3, 7, 20, 115, 233, 301, 328, 16902, ...
reference: Calvin C. Clawson, "Mathematical Mysteries, the beauty and magic of numbers," Perseus Books, Cambridge, Mass., 1996, pages 142 & 229.
David Wells, "The Penguin Dictionary of Curious and Interesting Numbers," Revised Edition, London, England, 1997, page 30.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Nested Radical.
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 01 2002
